ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: What is to come is imminent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The imminent Hour has drawn near,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Day of Judgment is drawing nearer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The approaching event has come near.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The Hour that was to come draws ever nearer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: There hath approached the approaching Hour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The Imminent [Hour] is near at hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The Day of Resurrection draws near,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The Imminent is near at hand;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:57] The Impending [Hour] is imminent: the Resurrection is near at hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The threatened Hour is nigh) the advent of the Hour is close.
